DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study compare subjective performance comfilcon A lens samfilcon A lens 4 week reusable lens wear .
DOC.brief_title: Multi-Center Clinical Evaluation Two Reusable Soft Contact Lenses
DOC.detailed_description: This 90 subject , randomize , bilateral , subject-masked , dispense , cross-over study compare comfilcon A versus samfilcon A lenses 8 week daily wear ( 2 x 4-weeks ) . Both eye wear lens ( test control ) 4 week randomize fashion . Subjects mask lens type investigator mask lens code .
DOC.criteria: Inclusion : Spherical distance Contact Lens prescription 1.00 6.00D +1.00 +4.00D eye ( inclusive ) Adapted soft Contact Lens wearer ( i.e . > 1 month ) , daily disposable reusable lens wearer . Spectacle cylinder 0.75D eye . Correctable 6/9 ( 20/30 ) eye Be 18 50 year age ( inclusive ) Able read , comprehend sign inform consent Own mobile phone willing respond Short Message Service ( SMS ) survey Willing comply wear study visit schedule Exclusion : Existing Biofinity Ultra wearer Any active corneal infection , injury inflammation Systemic ocular allergy , might interfere Contact Lens wear Systemic disease , might interfere Contact Lens wear Ocular disease , might interfere Contact Lens wear Strabismus amblyopia Subjects undergone corneal refractive surgery Subjects keratoconus severe corneal irregularity contraindicate lens wear Pregnant lactating Use systemic/topical medication contraindicate Contact Lens wear Diabetic Site employee family member site employee
